float2.h

00001 #ifndef _MATH_FLOAT2_H
00002 #define _MATH_FLOAT2_H
00003 
00004 
00005 #include <math/float.h>
00006 #include <xmath.h>
00007 
00008 
00009 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(math) 
00010 
00011 
00012 
00021 class float2
00022 {
00023 public:
00025     float       x;
00026         
00028     float       y;
00029         
00030 #ifdef _DEBUG
00031 
00032     float2()                                                                        {y=x=getNaN();}
00033 #else
00034     float2()                                                                        {}
00035 #endif
00036             
00038     float2( float X, float Y )                                                      : x(X), y(Y) {}
00039         
00041     float2& operator+=( const float2& other )                                       {x+=other.x; y+=other.y; return *this;}
00042                                                                                             
00044     float2& operator-=( const float2& other )                                       {x-=other.x; y-=other.y; return *this;}
00045             
00047     float2& operator*=( float s )                                                   {x*=s; y*=s; return *this;}
00048 
00050     float2& operator*=( const float2& other )                                       {x*=other.x; y*=other.y; return *this;}
00051 
00053     float&      operator[]( int index )                                             {return *((&x)+index);}
00054         
00056     float*      begin()                                                             {return &x;}
00057             
00059     float*      end()                                                               {return &x + 2;}
00060         
00062     float2      operator+( const float2& other ) const                              {float2 v; for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) (&v.x)[i] = (&x)[i] + (&other.x)[i]; return v;}
00063             
00065     float2      operator-( const float2& other ) const                              {float2 v; for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) (&v.x)[i] = (&x)[i] - (&other.x)[i]; return v;}
00066 
00068     float2      operator*( const float2& other ) const                              {float2 v; for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) (&v.x)[i] = (&x)[i] * (&other.x)[i]; return v;}
00069 
00071     float2      operator-() const                                                   {float2 v; for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) (&v.x)[i] = -(&x)[i]; return v;}
00072                 
00074     float2      operator*( float s ) const                                          {float2 v; for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) (&v.x)[i] = (&x)[i] * s; return v;}
00075                                                                                                 
00077     const float&    operator[]( int index ) const                                   {/*assert(index>=0&&index<2);*/ return *((&x)+index);}
00078                                                                                                 
00080     bool        operator==( const float2& other ) const                             {for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) if ( (&x)[i] != (&other.x)[i] ) return false; return true;}
00081     
00083     bool        operator!=( const float2& other ) const                             {for ( int i = 0 ; i < 2 ; ++i ) if ( (&x)[i] != (&other.x)[i] ) return true; return false;}
00084 
00086     float       length() const                                                      {return ::sqrtf( lengthSquared() );}
00087                                                                                     
00089     float       lengthSquared() const                                               {return x*x+y*y;}
00090                                                                                     
00092     const float*    begin() const                                                   {return &x;}
00093     
00095     const float*    end() const                                                     {return &x + 2;}
00096 
00098     bool        finite() const;
00099 };
00100 
00101 
00105 inline float2 operator*( float s, const float2& v )
00106 {
00107     return float2( v.x*s, v.y*s );
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00114 inline float dot( const float2& a, const float2& b )
00115 {
00116     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y;
00117 }
00118 
00122 inline float2 normalize( const float2& v )
00123 {
00124     return v * (1.f / ::sqrtf( v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y ));
00125 }
00126 
00130 inline float2 saturate( const float2& v )
00131 {
00132     return float2( 
00133         v.x < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.x > 1.f ? 1.f : v.x),
00134         v.y < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.y > 1.f ? 1.f : v.y) );
00135 }
00136 
00140 inline float2 clamp( const float2& v, const float2& minv, const float2& maxv )
00141 {
00142     return float2( 
00143         v.x < minv.x ? minv.x : (v.x > maxv.x ? maxv.x : v.x),
00144         v.y < minv.y ? minv.y : (v.y > maxv.y ? maxv.y : v.y) );
00145 }
00146 
00150 inline float2 abs( const float2& v )
00151 {
00152     return float2( 
00153         v.x < 0.f ? -v.x : v.x,
00154         v.y < 0.f ? -v.y : v.y );
00155 }
00156 
00160 float2 normalize0( const float2& v );
00161 
00162 
00163 END_NAMESPACE() // math
00164 
00165 
00166 #endif // _MATH_FLOAT2_H
